module.name: part_occurrence
module.keywords: module, piece part, occurrence, assembly, design

abstract.li: the specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of part occurrences in a product structure.
This second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part;
items within the scope of application module Assembly structure, ISO/TS 10303-1026;
items within the scope of application module Generic product occurrence, ISO/TS 10303-1762;
items within the scope of application module Part view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1023.

alt_map.description: If the Definition_based_part_occurrence is referred to by at least an Assembly_component_relationship and by no Assembled_part_association.
alt_map.refpath: assembly_component_usage <= product_definition_usage product_definition_usage <= product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

alt_map.description: If the Product_occurrence is referred to by at least an Assembled_part_association.
alt_map.refpath: {[product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part occurrence'] [product_definition ([product_definition <- product_definition_occurrence_relationship.occurrence product_definition_occurrence_relationship product_definition_occurrence_relationship.occurrence_usage ->] [product_definition <- product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship {product_definition_relationship.name = 'definition usage'} product_definition_relationship.relating_product_definition -> product_definition <- {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'} product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship => product_definition_usage =>] assembly_component_usage)]}

product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part occurrence'} product_definition <- product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship {product_definition_relationship.name = 'definition usage'}

alt_map.description: If the Definition_based_part_occurrence is mapped only onto assembly_component_usage.
alt_map.refpath: assembly_component_usage <= product_definition_usage <= product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

alt_map.description: If the Definition_based_part_occurrence is mapped only onto product_definition.
alt_map.refpath: product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part occurrence'} product_definition <- product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship {product_definition_relationship.name = 'definition usage'} product_definition_relationship.relating_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

ae.refpath: product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part occurrence'} product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation {product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name = 'part'} {product_definition_formation = configuration_design_item configuration_design_item <- configuration_design.design {configuration_design.name = 'product design'} configuration_design.configuration -> configuration_item (configuration_item => product_identification) (configuration_item => product_identification product_identification => product_specification)}
